kmaOrange::InfoBuffer

kmaOrange::InfoBuffer Class Reference

This class is stored the string buffer and the information of a searched auxiliary verb, pre-final ending or predicative suffix in a word. More...

Detailed Description

This class is stored the string buffer and the information of a searched auxiliary verb, pre-final ending or predicative suffix in a word.
